info.name: Dubtopian Review Option Theme 2nd option page
info.description: This is a Supplement to http://userstyles.org/styles/86173/dubtopian-review-option-theme this one controls more things like other text color. This might be adapted into it at a later date, but I'm keeping it like this to keep it more organized.

c. Third color for more flexibility

Default: none if using custom text color
Yes: use Hover Color below to pick
Default or none if using custom color
Yes: use Visited Link Color below

settings.label: 5. Custom Gradient color to replace default Login and Top Ten Anime gradient color
